data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trivinho-Strixino, Susana (2017): Brazilian Pseudochironomini (Diptera: Chironomidae) Part 1. New Pseudochironomus Malloch from highlands. Zootaxa 4317 (1): 134-154, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4317.1.6|5 occurrences
